summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is navigating through an urban area with parked cars on both sides of the road. The vehicle is moving at a slow speed, encountering various parked cars and pedestrians along the way.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a slow and steady speed, navigating through the urban area with caution. The vehicle is avoiding parked cars and ensuring a safe distance from pedestrians.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A black car, approximately 5 meters away, parked and partially blocking the view. 2) Right side: A red car, approximately 3 meters away, parked and blocking the view. 3) Front: A white car, approximately 10 meters away, parked and potentially about to move.
